Title: Say That You Love Me
Writer: RJ Nuevas (story and screenplay), Suzette Doctolero (story and screenplay)
Actors: Mark Herras, Jennylyn Mercado, Bearwin Meily, Tuesday Vargas
Plot: MARK HERRAS & JENNYLYN MERCADO stars as Stephen & Kristine, two strangers whose romantic destinies are entwined with a message in a bottle thrown into the sea by a sad little girl 10 years ...
